enWisdom: Hope in the mercy of Allah brings more success
The greatest affliction is the severance of hope

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْمُسْلِمِينَ إِسْلَاماً مَنْ كَانَ هَمُّهُ لِأُخْرَاهُ وَاعْتَدَلَ خَوْفُهُ وَرَجَاهُ
enWisdom: The best of all Muslims in practicing Islam is he whose efforts are for his Hereafter and whose fear [of Allah’s wrath] is balanced with his hope [in His mercy]

Wisdom: إِذَا أَرَادَ أَحَدُكُمْ أَنْ لَا يَسْأَلَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ شَيْئاً إِلَّا أَعْطَاهُ فَلْيَيْئَسْ مِنَ النَّاسِ وَلَا يَكُونُ لَهُ رَجَاءٌ إِلَّا اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: If any one of you wishes that he should never ask Allah, the Glorified, for anything but that He grants it to him, then he should lose hope in people and should not have hope in anyone other than Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: جَارُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ آمِنٌ وَعَدُوُّهُ خَائِفٌ
enWisdom: One who is close to Allah is safe, while [one who is] His enemy is frightened

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الظَّنِّ أَنْ تُخْلِصَ الْعَمَلَ وَتَرْجُوَ مِنَ اللَّهِ أَنْ يَعْفُوَ عَنِ الزَّلَلِ
enWisdom: Thinking positive means making your actions sincere and hoping that Allah will forgive your missteps
Many a person who is secure gets frightened
Many a hope leads to deprivation
Many a fear turns into security
Despair kills its owner

Wisdom: كُنْ لِمَا لَا تَرْجُو أَقْرَبَ مِنْكَ لِمَا تَرْجُو
enWisdom: Be closer to that which you do not hope for than [you are to] that which you hope for
Just as you hope, fear
One whose certitude is firm, has hope

Wisdom: مَنْ يَكُنِ اللَّهُ أَمَلَهُ يُدْرِكْ غَايَةَ الْأَمَلِ وَالرَّجَاءِ [وَ نِهَايَةَ الرَّجَاءِ]
enWisdom: One whose hope is [to reach] Allah, shall realize the fulfilment of his hope and aspiration

Wisdom: مَنْ جَعَلَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ مَوْئِلَ رَجَائِهِ كَفَاهُ أَمْرَ دِينِهِ وَدُنْيَاهُ
enWisdom: Whoever makes Allah, the Glorified, the refuge of his hopes, He will suffice him in his religious and worldly affairs
One who has certitude is hopeful
Do not have hope [or expectation] except from your Lord

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي لِمَنْ عَرَفَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ أَنْ لَا يَخْلُوَ قَلْبُهُ مِنْ رَجَائِهِ وَخَوْفِهِ
enWisdom: It behoves the one who is cognizant of Allah, the Glorified, not to make his heart devoid of hope in Him and fear of Him
Sincerity is the goal of religion
Sincerity is the highest [level of] faith
The adornment of the hearts is sincerity of faith

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِإِخْلَاصِ الْإِيمَانِ فَإِنَّهُ السَّبِيلُ إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ وَالنَّجَاةُ مِنَ النَّارِ
enWisdom: Make your faith sincere, for this is the path to Paradise and safety from hellfire

Wisdom: مَا ارْتَابَ مُخْلِصٌ وَلَا شَكَّ مُوقِنٌ
enWisdom: The sincere one is not suspicious and the one who is certain does not doubt
Belief in the oneness of Allah enlivens the soul

Wisdom: كُلُّ عَزِيزٍ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ ذَلِيلٌ
enWisdom: Every honoured other than  Allah is a inferior

Wisdom: مَنْ تَعَزَّزَ بِاللَّهِ لَمْ يُذِلَّ سُلْطَانٌ
enWisdom: One who is given honour by Allah cannot be humiliated by any king
